text: The Animal Rights Militia (ARM) is an animal rights group. The ARM does not have a leader. It is inspired by the Animal Liberation Front (ALF) which also does not have a leader.Food bar pulled from shelves, Edmonton Journal, January 4th 1992. An ARM group may be just one person. Members of the ARM think violence is justified. Members of the ALF do not think this is true.Lee, Ronnie. Controversial Actions , No Compromise, issue #23. ==References== Category:Animal rights
title: Animal Rights Militia
